description: The Odd Jobs` TV breaks out with Sachan inside. Gintoki tells Sadaharu to throw her away with the TV, but Sachan`s precious glasses are broken in the process. Gintoki reluctantly buys Sa-chan a new pair of glasses, but they are bottle bottom glasses that are clearly the wrong prescription. Sa-chan is overjoyed that Gintoki has given her a present, but the new glasses are responsible for a chain of failures on her assassination job. Her superiors now question her commitment.

titles.title: Glasses Are Part of the Soul
Megane wa Kokoro no Ichibu Desu
メガネは魂[こころ]の一部です
